event.title: Live Music: Rodney Hughes and Katelyn Hood
event.description: This event is rescheduled for Oct 6. We open at 3pm. We are excited to have Nacho Nachos back at 5pm! Music starts at 6pm. Come out, bring your chair, relax with a cold beer, enjoy delicious food and great music!

event.title: Dog Halloween Costume Contest at the Brewery
event.description: Bring your pups (on a leash) dressed up for some Halloween fun at the Brewery! Prizes for the Cutest, Funniest, and Most Creative dog costume! Enjoy the contest, cold beer, & football games on TV! Cheers! Special Guest Judges: Mayor Tom Reid, Clay Pearson, Trent Perez, Roy Castillo, Amy Hill, Charisse Barry, Jadeth Whittaker, Dr. Donna Henry, DVM

event.title: Texans vs Chiefs
event.description: We are extending our hours tomorrow, Oct 8 for the Texans vs. Chiefs game. We open at noon, kickoff is at 7:30p. TVs inside and we will be projecting the game on a big outdoor movie screen so bring a chair! Buy a football pint glass, get $1 off pints every Sunday during football season.

event.title: Live Music Featuring Chris Hardy
event.description: Chris Hardy is coming back this Friday! You don't want to miss this great performer! He will have you dancing on the lawn or patio! We open at 3pm; music starts at 6:30. Bring your family, friends and a chair. Enjoy the music and take family pics in the pumpkin patch! Plenty of board games and outdoor fun. A/C inside. Chalu's Wings will be serving up tasty food. Dogs on leash are always welcomed! Cheers!
